docs.title: Mid-Willamette Area Square Dance
docs.text:
Mid-Willamette Area Council

Find a dance. Meet your people.

Palette Find a Dance For New Dancers Council & Minutes

Clubs

Directory, dance nights, halls, contacts.

Calendar

Area dances and festivals at a glance.

Callers & Cuers

Local talent and booking info.

New Dancers

How to start, what to expect, where to go.

docs.title: Braids and Braves
docs.text: President: Don/Deena Myatt Vice-President: Trena/Chuck Worthington Secretary: Verna Behm-Wishart Treasurer: Lynn Gadberry Delegate: Vacant Caller: Bruce Lowther/Judy Russell Cuer: Judy Russel/Bruce Lowther

docs.title: MWA Council Directory
docs.text: Website: midwillamettearea.org Council Meetings: 3rd Monday, 7:30 PM — September, November, January, March, May Location: Salem Square Dance Center, 3695 45th Avenue NE, Salem, OR 97305

docs.title: Mid-Willamette Palette (Simplified)
docs.text: Two six-color schemes with tinted backgrounds (no pure white/black). Chips list HEX and RGB.

docs.title: Valley Morning (Light)
docs.text: Background · River MistHEX #EAF3F1RGB 234, 243, 241 Surface · Lichen VeilHEX #F4F8F6RGB 244, 248, 246 Text · BasaltHEX #2F3437RGB 47, 52, 55 Primary · Santiam TealHEX #2D767FRGB 45, 118, 127 Secondary · Douglas FirHEX #2E4A3BRGB 46, 74, 59 Accent · Oak SavannaHEX #B6872ERGB 182, 135, 46

docs.title: River Dusk (Dark)
docs.text: Background · River NightHEX #0F1617RGB 15, 22, 23 Surface · Deep ForestHEX #141D1CRGB 20, 29, 28 Text · FogHEX #E8ECEBRGB 232, 236, 235 Primary · Santiam Teal 400HEX #6FBABFRGB 111, 186, 191 Secondary · MossHEX #6E9C87RGB 110, 156, 135 Accent · Oak Savanna 300HEX #D2AC5CRGB 210, 172, 92

docs.title: Minimal tokens (optional)
docs.text:
```css / Light / [data-md-color-scheme="default"]{ --md-default-bg-color:#EAF3F1; / Background / --mwa-surface:#F4F8F6; / Surface / --md-default-fg-color:#2F3437; / Text / --md-primary-fg-color:#2D767F; / Primary / --mwa-secondary:#2E4A3B; / Secondary / --md-accent-fg-color:#B6872E; / Accent / }

/ Dark / [data-md-color-scheme="slate"]{ --md-default-bg-color:#0F1617; / Background / --mwa-surface:#141D1C; / Surface / --md-default-fg-color:#E8ECEB; / Text / --md-primary-fg-color:#6FBABF; / Primary / --mwa-secondary:#6E9C87; / Secondary / --md-accent-fg-color:#D2AC5C; / Accent / }
